channel.title: WMCO on Red Hat Telco Tigers Repository

item.title: Containerizing a Legacy Windows ASP.NET application
item.description: NerdDinner-OCP walks a user through deploying a legacy Windows ASP.net 4.8 application inside a Windows container and deploying it to an OpenShift cluster. It contains a multi-stage build Dockerfile that can be used to compile the application without the need of Visual Studio. This helps to demonstrate a containerized workflow for Windows Container app building.
